DOC.brief_title: Thoracic Spine Thrust Manipulation Cervicogenic Headaches : A Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Headaches list 1 10 disabling condition worldwide . ( Stovner et al. , 2007 ) cervicogenic headache ( CeHs ) comprise 15 % individual complaint . ( Nillsson , 1995 ) ; ( Fernandez de-las-penas et al. , 2005 ) The current best approach conservative care condition yet determine . Evidence suggest manipulative therapy aim cervical spine combination exercise helpful alleviating symptom . ( Jull et al. , 2002 ) The risk injury cervical spine manipulative technique document remote ( Haldeman et al. , 2002 ; DiFabio 1999 ) , however potential consequence severe . Therefore inherently low risk , thoracic spine manipulation may suitable alternative evidence accumulate influence cervical spine . ( Mintken et al. , 2010 ; Boyles et al. , 2009 ; Cleland et al. , 2005 & 2007 A & B , 2010 ; Flynn et al. , 2001 ; Fernandez-de-las-penas et al. , 2004 ; Piva et al. , 2000 ; Browder et al. , 2004 ) The primary aim study determine whether individual CeHs respond program thoracic spine thrust manipulation isolation . This may current body evidence offer alternative , potentially safe approach conservative care individual condition . Additionally , result study may serve drive large scale RCT offering information regard feasibility recruitment individual chronic CeHs well time dose intervention .
